thread.section_title: Pool Supplies Superstore Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pool Supplies Superstore | poolsuppliessuperstore.com
thread.title: Kelley Robinson
thread.title_full: Pool Supplies Superstore reviewed by Kelley Robinson

author: Kelley Robinson
title: Kelley Robinson
text:
Website advertises next day delivery. Bold type. However Somewhere they list states not next day delivery. Not obvious.
Called when it didn't arrive within 3 days. They Said my state wasn't next day delivery. Instead it Should be there in 7 days. Didn't arrive for 10 days.
Not worth any small amount of money that I may have saved.
Ok if you aren't in need of supplies in any sort of timeframe.
